items.title_original: Building CI/CD Pipelines for Non-Deterministic Agents
items.title_neutral: Building CI/CD Pipelines for Non-Deterministic Agents
items.excerpt: Traditional CI/CD breaks for probabilistic systems. Use LLM-as-a-Judge to evaluate agent outputs. Replace string equality with semantic assertions. Expect flakiness — manage it with multiple runs and invariants. Test behavior, not exact answers.

items.main_idea: Building CI/CD Pipelines for Non-Deterministic Agents

items.title_original: AI Agents Need Their Own Money, and Stablecoins Aren’t It
items.title_neutral: AI Agents Need Their Own Money, and Stablecoins Aren’t It
items.excerpt: Autonomous AI agents do not naturally participate in that institutional economy. They cannot (yet) walk into a bank, sign contracts, pass KYC, or enforce disputes in court without human intermediaries. We need money that maps directly onto the resources agents actually consume. Energy Money.
